author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Puducherry unit of Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) on Wednesday said that no party would be able to form the next Government in Puducherry without its support.

Talking to reporters here, BJP Puducherry unit president V. Saminathan said that the party had emerged as a decisive force and would play an important role in the formation of the next Government in Puducherry.

People in the Union Territory have realised that support of the BJP led National Democratic Alliance (NDA) at the Centre is essential for the growth and development of Puducherry.

He claimed that his party had enrolled over 75,000 members in Puducherry with 3,000 members enrolled in each constituency.

No party can form the Government in Puducherry without the support of the BJP, he said.

Preparatory work on

The party has started the preparatory work for elections and party conferences would be conducted at district level where Union Ministers are expected to participate.
title: No party can form govt. without our support: BJP
